title: Curvy wide all-caps
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20110427083637im_/http:/typophile.com/files/main_investors_5497.gif)

I have to change these words on a website but i dont know what font is this curvy wide all-caps font. Can anyone please identify? I think Frontpage was used on the site.
author: AllenL

comments.content: Wow! that was quick! you're awesome! thank you very much!
